"[Active Skill]
Draws the attention of all nearby enemies,
and makes your attacks get enemy
attention more easily for a set time.
※Main Class only."

"Allows you to survive damage that
would incapacitate you with 1 HP.
Makes you temporarily invincible
after activating.
※Main Class only."

"[Active Skill]
For a set time, reduces damage taken
and makes you immune to knockback
and flinching from enemy attacks."

"Boosts the damage of PAs if you are
hit by an attack immediately after
activating them.
※Hunter weapons only."

"When you successfully perform a Sword
Guard Counter, you can input a normal
attack for an additional counterattack."

"ソードによる通常攻撃段数が、
最大５段階に増加する。"

"Increases the number of steps in
your normal attack combo to 5.
※Sword only."

"Automatically performs a counterattack
when you successfully Just Guard an
attack with your Weapon Action.
※Sword only."

"Makes Guard Weapon Actions protect
you from all directions.
※Hunter weapons only."

"Recovers PP each time Hunter Art
Avenge activates."

"Briefly blocks all damage from enemies
when you use a PA.
※Hunter weapons only."

"Makes you fall more slowly while
charging a PA.
※Hunter weapons only."

"Using different PAs from the same
weapon in a row makes your normal
attack combo skip to the 4th step, or
the final step if combo length is 3 or less.
※Hunter weapons only."

"Using one PA multiple times in a row
makes your normal attack combo skip
to the 3rd step.
※Hunter weapons only."

"Hold the Weapon Action button to fire
a Photon Spear that counts the damage
dealt to the enemy it embeds in. The
Photon Spear explodes after a set
time, or when it takes enough damage.
※Partizan only."

"Allows you to perform a chargable thrust attack by pressing the Weapon Action button with the correct timing after using a PA.
※Partizan only."

"Boosts the power of Assault Charge
when used after a PA that was
boosted by Hunter Art Avenge."

"Increases the number of steps in
your normal attack combo to 4.
※Wired Lance only."

"Alters the behavior of your Weapon
Action when you use it while inputting
a direction.
※Wired Lance only."

"Briefly blocks all damage from enemies
when you activate your Weapon Action.
※Wired Lance only."

"[Active Skill]
Adds a gauge that fills up when you deal
damage with a rifle. Activate to consume
the gauge and fire a short-range blast.
※Assault Rifle only."

"Adds invincibility time when you activate
Spread Shot, and allows you to move
further during the attack."

"[Active Skill]
Fires a bullet that temporarily boosts
damage dealt to the part it hits.
※Main Class/Assault Rifle only."

"Hiting a part affected by Weak Bullet
enough times boosts damage dealt to
that part even more and extends the
duration of the effect.
※Main Class only."

"Grants temporary invincibility when
you activate your Weapon Action.
※Assault Rifle only."

"Hold the Weapon Action button to
attack with a grenade. If you input
a direction, you fire the grenade.
Otherwise, you set it as a mine.
※Assault Rifle only."

"Makes you fall more slowly while using
a normal attack.
※Ranger weapons only."

"Makes you fall more slowly while
charging a PA.
※Ranger weapons only."

"Reduces the cooldown after activating
your Weapon Action.
※Launcher only."

"Tightens the spread on charged normal
attacks if you fire while inputting forwards.
※Launcher only."

"Reduces the chance of status effects
being applied to you."

"Reduces the duration of status effects
that are applied to you."

"[Active Skill]
Boosts weapon power and increases
maximum PP for a set time.
※Main Class/Force weapons only."

"[Active Skill]
Boosts PP regeneration for a set time,
but also reduces maximum HP."

"PP is not prevented from regenerating
while you charge Techniques.
※Force weapons only."

"If you perform a Weapon Action or Step
while charging a Technique, you will keep
your charge. If you use that Technique again
it will cost 0 PP and will charge more quickly.
※Rod only."

"Whenever you use a Resta Sign, other
nearby characters will also recover HP.
※Main Class only."

"While Photon Flare is active, Technique
power is reduced, but their charge time
is also reduced.
※Main Class/Force weapons only."

"Any Technique used immediately after
successfully blocking an attack with a
Guard or evading one with Step gains
invincibility time.
※Rod only."

"When Photon Flare ends, you regain PP
based on how much PP you spent while
Photon Flare was active.
※Main Class only."

"Recovers PP each time a nearby
enemy is downed or defeated."

"Any Technique used immediately after
successfully blocking an attack with a
Guard also fires a Tech bullet of the
same Attribute.
※Rod only."

"ロッド装備中、
ステップでの回避、

"Recovers PP if you do not attack

"Using your Weapon Action without

"Makes you fall more slowly while

"Hitting enemies with uncharged Ice

"Hitting enemies with uncharged Lightning

"[Active Skill]

"チェインフィニッシュ発生後に、
チェイントリガー中のチェイン数に応じて、
再発動が可能になるまでの

このスキルはメインクラスのみ適用される。"
